direPiercing.name: Dire Piercing
direPiercing.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Piercing resistance

direElectric.name: Dire Electric
direElectric.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Electric resistance

direExplosive.name: Dire Explosive
direExplosive.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Explosive resistance

direBurning.name: Dire Burning
direBurning.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Burning resistance

combust.name: Combust
combust.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Explosive Damage

flood.name: Flood
flood.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Flooding Damage

sparks.name: Sparks
sparks.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Electric Damage

burn.name: Burn
burn.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Burning Damage

pierce.name: Pierce
pierce.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Piercing Damage

fix.name: Fix
fix.description: Increases Repair Amount by %s-%s per shot

antiBlast.name: Anti-Blast
antiBlast.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Shell-shocked status effect by %s-%s%

insulator.name: Insulator
insulator.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Stormstruck status effect by %s-%s%

douser.name: Douser
douser.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Ablaze status effect by %s-%s%

sealant.name: Sealant
sealant.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Flooded status effect by %s-%s%

reinforcer.name: Reinforcer
reinforcer.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Punctured status effect by %s-%s%
